post:
StarryDNS has been established since 2012, and aims to provide realiable and high performance hosting services. Today we bring VPS offers in Hong Kong, Singapore, and Los Angeles.

All plans include
- Enterprise Hardware
- Tier 3 Datacentre
- Premium Network Transits and Peers
- 1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
- Free IPv6 Address upon request
- Free Directadmin
- Free BGP Session

Payment methods include
- Paypal
- Credit Card (via Stripe)
- Bank Transfer


**Hong Kong & Singapore offers**

- 1 CPU
- 1 GB RAM
- 20 GB HDD
- 1 IP
- 100 Mbps Bandwidth  (No Direct China Route)
- 500 GB Traffic
- $7/Month with coupon code **SEPSALE**
[Click to Order Hong Kong](https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=432)
[Click to Order Singapore](https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=561)


**Los Angeles, USA offers**

- 1 CPU
- 1 GB RAM
- 30 GB HDD
- 1 IP
- 100 Mbps Bandwidth
- 1000 GB Traffic
- $5.3 / Month with coupon code **SEPSALE**
[Click to Order Los Angeles](https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=500)
